name: PKInkingTool.InkType
desc: The type that defines the shape of stroked lines.

items.name: case marker
items.desc: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a felt-tip marker.

items.name: case pen
items.desc: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a pen-based drawing.

items.name: case pencil
items.desc: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a narrow line from a pencil.

items.name: var rawValue: String
items.desc: The raw string value of a given enumeration case.

items.name: init?(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Create a new ink type using a string.

items.name: var defaultWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: The default line width for the specified tool type.

items.name: var validWidthRange: ClosedRange<CGFloat>
items.desc: The range of widths allowed for an ink of this type.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value representing this ink type.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Generates hash values into a hasher structure reference that you provide.

items.name: static func != (PKInkingTool.InkType, PKInkingTool.InkType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two ink types arenâ€™t the same.
